about_the_game: Expand your AEW player roster with FTR, former AEW World Tag Team Champions, Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler AND gain access to two brand new minigames: JoinUs and Deth Race-X

content_descriptors.notes: Blood could be visible in barbed wire matches and if using certain weapons. You can turn off blood effects at anytime in the options menu!

detailed_description: Expand your AEW player roster with FTR, former AEW World Tag Team Champions, Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler AND gain access to two brand new minigames: JoinUs and Deth Race-X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: At least 4 GB Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD FX 8350 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: At least 6 GB Video Memory

short_description: Expand your AEW player roster with FTR, former AEW World Tag Team Champions, Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler AND gain access to two brand new minigames: JoinUs and Deth Race-X
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
